Engine

Class Enviroment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.Enviroment

  • public class Enviroment
extends java.lang.Object
    Multi-thread Environment This class sets up the multi-threaded environment required by Kakadu
    Since:
    08/02/2013
    Author:
    Dylan McCarthy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Enviroment()
      Constructor Creates the Environment based off the amount of available processors
      Enviroment(int threads)
      Constructor Creates the Environment based off a given number of threads

      Return the created environment

      Return the number of threads created
      kdu_jni.Kdu_thread_queue getQueue()
      Returns the Queue associated with this environment

      Forces the Threads to join
